module.name: product_view_definition_properties
module.purpose: The Product view definition properties application module supports the requirement to assign properties to product view definitions .

inscope.li: The assignment of properties to product view definitions.

uof.name: Product_View_Definition_Properties
uof.description: The product view definition properties UoF enables the assignment of properties to a Product_view_definition.

aa.refpath: property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition product_definition
